reviewText:
After finding a playable version of this collectible masterpiece, it only shows how far some can go to capture it all. If there were ever a sports anime that were to exist that was ever worth watching, this is your pick.

- "New Challenger" is a new, but slightly shorter form of the other which held 2 Seasons so far.

* All there is to say is, "Get Ready to Rumble"!!!
